name: HYPER BEAM – A Twin-Stick Arcade Survival Game
name_original: HYPER BEAM – A Twin-Stick Arcade Survival Game
description:
"Hyper Beam is a heavy-hitting, minimalist mobile title that is difficult to put down. Iron Man Challenge for Your Thumbs."
- 10/10 | GameSkinny

"Seriously, this game has it all: incredibly gripping gameplay, flawless controls, stylish visuals, an electrifying soundtrack, and a burgeoning community of high-score chasers to compete against. I can’t recommend it enough."
- 5/5 | iFanzine

"Fast paced, full of enemies and ridiculously fun, HYPER BEAM is challenging in a way other mobile games can only dream of."
- IndieHangover

-----

DODGE | DESTROY | GET HYPER

Control two players as one linked by an energy beam and you have to survive endless waves of enemies by dodging and destroying them. With every enemy destroyed, the beam charges. Once it’s fully charged, unleash hyper mode to transform into a much more powerful beam and devastate incoming ships. You'll have to be vigilant and agile to survive the vicious onslaught of enemy ships.

Good luck!

Once unlocked, you can choose between five beams that have their own unique hyper mode styles. HYPER BEAM features multiple levels and endless gameplay. Your survival and adaptation skills are truly tested. The game is free-to-play, with the ability to purchase an ad-free version. You can get additional plays by simply watching a video ad.

ADDITIONAL FEATURES
- Try to get to the top of the leaderboards by surviving the longest and destroying the most enemies.
- Explore the enemy types and see how many times they get you
- Experience a unique audio track for each sector

HOW TO PLAY
Control each ship with your thumbs. Move your thumbs to reposition your ships, as well as position your beam for maximum damage. If you're having trouble seeing your ships, you can move your thumbs out of the way and touch anywhere.
